casebody.data:
Arthur G. Leonard et al., Respondents, v. Charles Reizenstein, Impleaded, &c., Appellant. *560Decided May 2, 1887. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered upon verdict for plaintiffs. Adolph L. Sanger, for appellant. William H. Harris, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed with costs.
